text: The High Cost of Health: Analyzing America's Healthcare Affordability Crisis." A new report by PayZen reveals the stark reality of healthcare affordability in America. The statistics are alarming: many Americans struggle to pay for necessary medical care, forcing them to skip preventive visits, delay prescription medications, and forego mental health treatment. It's time we acknowledge the unsustainable path our healthcare system is on and embrace innovative solutions like AI-powered technologies that can help address affordability issues while improving patient outcomes. We must act now to ensure everyone has access to quality, affordable healthcare.
